ygData.subject: RE: Re: Silk Armors
ygData.msgSnippet: Shadowsilk is given out in the temple of Sol Ro Shadow Silk:  silk swatch, shadow wolf pelt, Gather Shadows Scroll (the necro invis spell) Inky Shadow Silk:
ygData.messageBody:
Shadowsilk is given out in the temple of Sol Ro

Shadow Silk: silk swatch, shadow wolf pelt, Gather Shadows Scroll (the
necro invis spell)

Inky Shadow Silk: Above but add an extra scroll

Large Shadow Silk: Same as first but add extra pelt.

I made the first with a tailoring skill of 20, but failed on the other 2
enough to pay someone to do it for me.


At 08:30 AM 10/27/1999 , you wrote:

>>From: srutkowski@...
>>
>>There are now several types of silk to be made. As you mentioned:
>>Silk- made by combining spider silk
>>Cured Silk- made by combining silk with heady kiola and other items
>>Glowing Silk- made by combining silk (or maybe cured silk) with enchanters
>>"mana" spells (vicious, purified, etc)
>>Shadowed Silk- made by combining silk (don't know which one) with
>necromancer
>>spells, and quest items
>>
>>Not sure of all the stuff found so far, but several of the web sites have
>the
>>instructions
>>
>>Ailamil Faithbringer
>>T. Marr
